00023 #ifndef __NITF_MEMORY_H__
00024 #define __NITF_MEMORY_H__
00025 
00026 /*
00027  *  \file
00028  *  Memory is a very simple allocation tracker.  When NITF_DEBUG
00029  *  is on, NITF_MALLOC and NITF_FREE to book-keeping.  When it is not,
00030  *  they turn into malloc() and free()
00031  */
00032 
00033 #ifdef NITF_DEBUG
00034 #   include "nitf/Debug.h"
00035 #   define NITF_MALLOC(P)  nitf_Debug_malloc(__FILE__, __LINE__, P)
00036 #   define NITF_REALLOC(P, S) nitf_Debug_realloc(__FILE__, __LINE__, P, S)
00037 #   define NITF_FREE(P)    nitf_Debug_free(__FILE__, __LINE__, P)
00038 #else
00039 #   define NITF_MALLOC  malloc
00040 #   define NITF_REALLOC realloc
00041 #   define NITF_FREE    free
00042 #endif
00043 
00044 #endif
